title: Четыре свадьбы
overview: Four brides, four grooms and just one honeymoon, for which they are ready to do anything.Brides enter the competition for a dream trip! Each of the girls will try to prove to her rivals that her wedding is the best. To do this, they will become guests of honor at each other's celebrations and try to evaluate the weddings of rivals. The winner of each edition of the Four Weddings program receives a gift - a cash prize, with which they can purchase a dream trip.
